org.prebake.core
Class PreformattedStaticHtml

java.lang.Object
  org.prebake.core.PreformattedStaticHtml
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gxp.base.GxpClosure, com.google.gxp.base.MarkupClosure, com.google.gxp.html.HtmlClosure, JsonSerializable
public class PreformattedStaticHtml
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonSerializable, com.google.gxp.html.HtmlClosure

A class that takes malformed HTML, removes sharp edges, normalizes it, and provides a plain text alternative.

See Also:
